Description: Rock crystal bottle; cylindrical; smaller in diameter at neck and foot; central band of ornamental Kufic in relief; now mounted with silver-gilt cap on mouth and foot, foot mount more recent; each mount held in place by five acanthus leaves; upper cap with suspension hook and inscribed in niello.
Curator's comments: Once used to contain a hair of the Virgin.
